Invocation Name: steamist
Developer Terms of Use
des: Now you can ask Alexa to start or stop your steam shower when using the TSC-550 control. Alexa will also provide the status and current temperature of your steam shower.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
